scripts.test-report: mkdir -p test/reports/unit && nyc ava --tap --timeout=30s --verbose test/*test.js > test/reports/unit/ava.tap
scripts.integration-test: export FUNCTIONS_CMD='functions-emulator' && sh test/updateFunction.sh && export BASE_URL="http://localhost:8010/$GCP_PROJECT/$GCF_REGION" && ava -T 20s --verbose -c 1 test/index.test.js test/*unit*test.js test/*integration*test.js
